title: Rogue
content: explained as a Rogue that has the ability to cast up to level 2 Spells. This gives the Arcane Trickster a vast array of abilities. an uncommon item that can be found in the Blighted Village can be extremely useful for Arcane Tricksters. Especially if their Intelligence isn't too high. While wearing the Warped Headband of Intellect, the Intelligence ability is set to 17. Knowing this beforehand, allows players to dump Intelligence to a low-level in character creation and use the remaining points
